comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Trackers)
 [https://montanablackmerch.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmontanablackmerch.com%2F)
### Comment
> This website is a fake merch site of the well-known German influencer MontanaBlack88. His official shop is at https://montanablack.de/ (currently closed according to him). On the fake site, clicking "Shop" or "Store" redirects to an external URL (https://teestow.com/product-category/montana-black-merch). Under "Contact," it shows a U.S. address (123 Fifth Avenue, NY 10160, New York), but his real shop is operated only in Germany, where he lives. I have already reported this site to Google Safe Browsing. Maybe you can block it via DNS Filter.
```
Username: @hArDsTyLe2000
```

comment.body:
Checking the dashboard, the blocked service is app-measurement.com.
However, it is a generic service, which I believe the Google Phone app tries to access to query spam lists. I don't think I'm the only person who, since installing the AdGuard DNS filter, no longer has spam calls filtered, but I haven't found anything about it online.

AdGuard DNS, AdGuard for Windows, AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard Content Blocker ### AdGuard version latest ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? other (specify in comment below) ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sfb.bio.link ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Phishing URL Blocklist ### Other AdGuard Experimental filter ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots Hey, so bio.link gets blocked by both adguardDNS and My Adguard Client on Mac and WIndows Access blocked by AdGuard DNS: Dangerous website AdGuard DNS blocked access to thm.bio.link because it’s in our database of phishing and malicious domains The reason seems to be safebrowsing. Blocking the entire domain should not be needed. Blocking v2stats.bio.link analytics.bio.link is not the problem The problem is blocking PROFILENAME.bio.link bio.link/PROFILENAME cdn.bio.link I know someone who is friends with the owner, and the platform is NOT problematic. Some content is, but so is any website. Please keep me up to date on the issue by pinging @SpotlightForBugs Thank you ;D ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

AdGuard DNS, AdGuard for Windows, AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard Content Blocker ### AdGuard version latest ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? other (specify in comment below) ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sfb.bio.link ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Phishing URL Blocklist ### Other AdGuard Experimental filter ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots Hey, so bio.link gets blocked by both adguardDNS and My Adguard Client on Mac and WIndows Access blocked by AdGuard DNS: Dangerous website AdGuard DNS blocked access to thm.bio.link because it’s in our database of phishing and malicious domains The reason seems to be safebrowsing. issue.title: com.google.android.dialer - Spam call no longer filtered

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

I use private AdGuard DNS set in my Android phone

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.dialer

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The problem that occurs is that with the AdGuard DNS filter active, even with just the basic "agduard DNS filter" list, the spam filter for incoming calls in the Google Phone app no longer works.
With automatic DNS, the spam filter in the Google Phone app starts working again.

<details>
Checking the dashboard, the blocked service is "app-measurement.com"
However, it is a generic service, which I believe the Google Phone app tries to access to query spam lists. I don't think I'm the only person who, since installing the AdGuard DNS filter, no longer has spam calls filtered, but I haven't found anything about it online.
</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

Most likely, AdGuard does not affect this feature. I have blocked calls in my log.
It will take a few days to check again.

comment.body:
This ticket was closed before and other issues were checked (we could not reproduce them or issue is just not fixable, like in case of YouTube app for iOS/Android).

>Personally, I'm on Safari - MacOS (Incase you don't know, that is a Desktop based OS, and using a Browser) and the Ads are not being blocked. Especially after the MacBook is awaken from sleep/hibernation. You have to close out Safari entirely, then relaunch for AdGuard to start working again, (not just on Youtube, but on all sites)

That does not sound like a filter lists issue when it happens on all websites and ads are blocked after restarting browser.
If you are using Safari extension and ads are blocked after restarting Safari, please report your issue here - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues
In case of AdGuard for MacOS here - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForMac/issues

You can also try AdGuard Mini beta - https://adguard.com/en/blog/adguard-mini-for-mac-beta-is-out.html, perhaps it has been fixed already.

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to update the filters (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
> Реклама в приложении Авито, озон, я маркет

В озоне некоторые товары помечены рекламой, но это не убрать, иначе приложение будет сломано. Тоже самое с авито, яндекс маркет. Как вариант, можно пользоваться этими сервисами через браузер.

> Реклама на всех сайтах в Яндексе

Не повторяется. Рекомендуется обновить программу, а также включить в расширениях AdGuard Extra.

comment.body:
Не повторяется.
Попробуйте оставить только фильтры AdGuard из списка ниже, очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

comment.body:
@Mytherious could you check it using AdGuard for Firefox extension with System DNS enabled? AdGuard DNS must be disabled.
1. Install AdGuard for Firefox extension
2. Enable only AdGuard DNS filter
3. Open filtering log (FL)
4. Keep it in the background
5. Reproduce the issue
6. If you have it, add to the user rules this rule `@@||puzzles-games-api.gp-prod.conde.digital^`
7. Check the website
8. The request should be unblocked in the FL

issue.title: now.gg adblocking blocking
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension ### AdGuard version Version 5.2.80 ### What type of problem have you encountered? AdGuard gets detected on a website ### Which browser(s) do you use? other (specify in comment below), Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://now.gg/apps/pixonic/5711/war-robots.html ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. this is chromium. I switched from ublock origin which also is detected despite its scriptlets. I am using extension only. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: now.gg blocking adblocking. Site is evil: it prompts naïve user to disable adblocking. most content loads prior to the prompt. It cannot merely be hidden.
Screenshot N+1: adguard filters
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition
